Author: Qasi Molkot
Name: Where am I again?
Punchline: Shows what zone/region you are in, always.
Description: Shows what zone/region you are in up in the corner next to the server info. Open config with /locpls. Does not play nicely with Orchestrion (/porch) when the 'Show current song in the server info UI element in-game' is enabled, since it uses the same spot.
